subject: Music

description: A micro-lesson that makes Electronic Music's Worldwide Reach usable.

buildup.text: Techno emerged from Detroit's Black community. House music came from Chicago's underground clubs.

discovery.text: European DJs like Kraftwerk and later Daft Punk turned electronic sound into global pop culture.

twist.text: EDM festivals now draw hundreds of thousands â€” Tomorrowland sells out in minutes worldwide.
